DataSourcePortable.Name: CHART_GAUGE_TESTE
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="select sum(VALORTOTAL) valor1,
 sum(VALORTOTAL) valor2
from K_CRM_PESSOAOPORTUNIDADES
" /> <Fields> <DecimalField Alias="VALOR1" From="A" Path="VALOR1" FieldDecimalsFormat="0" /> <DecimalField Alias="VALOR2" From="A" Path="VALOR2" FieldDecimalsFormat="0" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
